message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe its unique features and capabilities are unparalleled in the market. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you for $1500000. We are confident that this investment will prove highly rewarding for you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and the benefits the product offers. I'm willing to negotiate further to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
